---
name: Device Unsupported!
about: Please don't create duplicated issues about Device Unsupported!
title: ''
labels: ''
assignees: ''

---

If you want to open a new duplicated issue about Device Unsupported, please **don't**! We are [working on it](https://github.com/localdesktop/localdesktop/pull/156) and would appreciate it if you could discuss it in one single thread [here](https://github.com/localdesktop/localdesktop/issues/137).

Otherwise, feel free to remove this and start describing your issue. Screenshots and device info are appreciated!
